cast.overview: Rising pop star Mima quits singing to pursue a career as an actress. After she takes up a role on a popular detective show, her handlers and collaborators begin turning up murdered. Harboring feelings of guilt and haunted by visions of her former self, Mima's reality and fantasy meld into a frenzied paranoia.
cast.title: Perfect Blue

details.biography:
Megumi Tano (田野 めぐみ, Tano Megumi, December 28, 1968) is a Japanese voice actress from Fukushima prefecture, Japan. She has been a member of the Tokyo Actor's Consumer's Cooperative Society (Haikyō) since 1997. Previously, she was attached to Arts Vision.

Her real name and former stage name is Megumi Tano (田野 恵, Tano Megumi).
details.name: Megumi Tano
